description.p: Arazealean (specifically, Civilized) names are short and rarely more than two syllables. But they almost always have a second first name. The surnames indicate the social class to which they belong

p.b: Male Names: Male names often, but notalways, end in -yk. Example: Riyk Yol Vi (Riyk The Lowly Craftsman)
Female Names: Female names often, but notalways, end in -yke. Example: Asha He Tis (Asha The Wealthy Priest)

description.p:
Ability Score Increase.Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.
Age.Young dragonborn grow quickly. They walk hours after hatching, attain the size and development of a 10-year-old human child by the age of 3, and reach adulthood by 15. They live to be around 80.
Alignment.Dragonborn tend to extremes, making a conscious choice for one side or the other in the cosmic war between good and evil (represented by Bahamut and Tiamat, respectively). Most dragonborn are good, but those who side with Tiamat can be terrible villains.
Size.Arazealean are taller and heavier than most other humans, standing well over 6 feet tall and averaging almost 250 pounds. Your size is Medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Arazealean ResilienceYour Unarmored AC is 13 + your STR modifier. UnbreakableYou have advantage to saves against exhaustion, disease and poison.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Vynic.
